## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                                   | Type      | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |

| `icon`     | `icon`     | Icon                                                                          | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `theme`    | `theme`    | Theme has the following themes: 'primary' \| 'secondary' \| 'light' \| 'dark' | `string`  | `'primary'` |
